Uses of Package
org.rapla.mobile.android.app

  • Packages that use org.rapla.mobile.android.app 
    Package Description
    org.rapla.mobile.android.app  
    org.rapla.mobile.android.os  
    org.rapla.mobile.android.utility.factory  
    org.rapla.mobile.android.widget  
    org.rapla.mobile.android.widget.adapter  
  • Classes in org.rapla.mobile.android.app used by org.rapla.mobile.android.app 
    Class and Description
    RaplaCategoryChoiceDialog
    The dialog allows for selecting a category (either the root category or one of its child categories) by displaying a list view with check boxes.
    RaplaCategoryChoiceDialog.RaplaCategoryOnClickListener
    This listener class listens to clicks on rapla category names and allows for drilling down on the clicked category.
    RaplaCategoryChoiceDialog.RaplaCategoryOnClickListenerFactory
    Factory class for RaplaCategoryOnClickListener to ease injection into the list view logic.
  • Classes in org.rapla.mobile.android.app used by org.rapla.mobile.android.os 
    Class and Description
    ExceptionDialog
    This class provides functionality to notify the user that the application has reached an unexpected state.
  • Classes in org.rapla.mobile.android.app used by org.rapla.mobile.android.utility.factory 
    Class and Description
    ExceptionDialog
    This class provides functionality to notify the user that the application has reached an unexpected state.
    LoadDataProgressDialog
    This class provides functionality to show a consistent progress dialog to the user while data are being retrieved.
  • Classes in org.rapla.mobile.android.app used by org.rapla.mobile.android.widget 
    Class and Description
    RaplaCategoryChoiceDialog
    The dialog allows for selecting a category (either the root category or one of its child categories) by displaying a list view with check boxes.

    Class and Description
    RaplaCategoryChoiceDialog
